A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointed with this garbage they tried pass off as a well thought out and fan-wanted film.  I have never left a theater after seeing a Star Wars movie feeling robbed until The Last Jedi. It could have been such a great installment of the Skywalker family story but they wasted their opportunity. Yes\, parts were great\, but as a whole there were just too many fumbles to forgive. What will Johnson do with this new trilogy that awaits? I know for me that my excitement and expectations could hardly be any lower.  Thanks so much Disney.  Well played.
